page.title: 02Heylans Farm Andoversford
page.content: Mr.Robert Gillet is the present tenant in Heylans Farm.The farm is a mixed farm with arable and beef stock.It is 160 acres in size with nine buildings.He needs alot of patience to farm his land.The average cost of running the arable part is from 12 to 14 thousand pounds a year.In the summer the average working hours are from twelve to seventeen hours a day.e.g.Mr.Gillet was up from 5a.m.until 9p.m.the day before we interviewed him.He then went to the Royal Oak pub. He does not like spraying because the chemicals are expensive.There are 4 working dogs but most of the work is done by tractors. He was brought up on a farm and has had no vandals on his.He plays bowls in Cheltenham in his spare time.
